snippet: One of three men accused of a loan-sharking scheme was labeled by federal prosecutors as a member of the Westies, a Hell’s Kitchen group that specialized in violence and extortion.
abstract: Daniel Hanley, accused by federal prosecutors of a Brooklyn loan-sharking scheme, is labeled as a member of the Westies, Irish-American Hell’s Kitchen gang that specialized in extortion and extreme violence; Hanley says accusations are baffling given that he has no clear ties to Hell's Kitchen, and the Westies gang has not been in existence for years.
lead_paragraph: One of three men accused of a loan-sharking scheme was labeled by federal prosecutors as a member of the Westies, a Hell’s Kitchen group that specialized in violence and extortion.

headline.seo: Westies, Said to Have Been Vanquished in ’80s, Make Cameo in Extortion Case
headline.main: Gang Said to Have Been Vanquished in ’80s Makes Cameo in Extortion Case
headline.print_headline: Gang Said to Have Been Vanquished in ’80s Makes Cameo in Extortion Case
